interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beard Comb Or Fine Tooth Mustache Pocket Stainless Steel Metal Powder Coated Black Keychain Comb For Men - 3.25 x 1 Inches by Death Grip
Review Date: 2022/06/09
Store: THE VINTAGE GROOMING CO.
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Metal', 'Brand': 'Death Grip', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Black', 'Size': 'Small', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 0.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Department': 'mens', 'UPC': '710702883497', 'Manufacturer': 'The Vintage Grooming Co'}
Review Text: Extremely well made, and well designed. A pocket size beard brush shouldn’t be impressive, but it really is. If this was plastic, it wouldn’t work. If it was a soft plastic, it wouldn’t help shape a straggly beard, or mustache. If it was hard plastic, it would probably snap. Instead, it is an excellent stainless steel, with enough strength to work perfectly, but is is small enough that you wouldn’t notice any extra weight on your keychain. I have to give the person that designed this a lot of credit. What a practical, and brilliant idea. Completely awesome!
Review Title: Brilliant!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner.
Alyxxndra
{'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'}
I am a huge fan of magnetic lashes in general , and these are great . These are an ideal solution to the lash dilemma many of us face. Mascara is a process to apply and still doesn’t give the dramatic results so many of us desire, regular false lashes have sticky glue to deal with and lead us to lose real lashes too. Then extensions are such a commitment. Magnetic lashes , like these especially are the solution.
Big fan

MOLANLY

Just by chance, I got these at the same time as a set of colored scrunchies. Obviously you know when you would wear these, and like the other set of scrunchies, this has a nice variety of colors, so coordinating with your outfit has never been easier. I don’t think I will ever just buy a set of dark neutral colors again. I would rather have the option to match my outfit, and also my mood! Highly recommended!
Perfect set of many different colors
Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 10 Pairs Magnetic Eyelash Natural Look, Upgraded 3D False Lashes Magnetic Eyeliner Kit with Tweezers and 2pcs Magnetic Eyeliner, Reusable, No Glue
Mussozy
{'Brand': 'Mussozy', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9 x 6 x 0.6 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 0.6 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '766779448732'}
I have been using magnetic lashes for about a year, and I never thought they would look, and work so well. Once you apply the liquid magnetic base, you can try different lashes, to see which pair matches up with your makeup, and wardrobe. This might sound like extra work, but that is the whole point of these. They are extremely easy to apply, and swap. They really look great, and I finally gave them a try, and wear them all the time.
Really great set of magnetic eyelashes

Excellent blenders, really are easy to use, and allows you to apply foundations, etc. with a perfect touch. Makeup goes on perfectly, and you can apply it exactly as you prefer. After use, they rinse out perfectly, so this set of ten should last a very long time. Highly recommended!
Perfect blenders and applicators
Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit, SOTICA 10Pairs Magnetic Lashes Natural False Eyelashes with Tweezers DIY Eyelash Extension Kit Authentic Eyelash Extension Look Easy to Use No Glue Needed…
Sotica
{'Package Dimensions': '9.26 x 5.95 x 0.83 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CS-JM-8'}
I have become a huge fan of magnetic eyelashes. The easy application is so great, it is hard to believe, until you try it yourself. It is as easy as applying eyeliner. The liquid liner has a the base in it that the magnetic lashes stick to. It doesn’t sound like that would work as well as it should, but it does. The best thing after the easy application is you can try different types of lashes, included in the set, to see which one is perfect for your makeup and wardrobe choice. I have friends that didn’t believe how great these are until I let them see them in person. I have tried many different brands, and this is an excellent choice if you are going to try them for the first time, or you have been using them already. Highly recommended!
Awesome magnetic lashes, easy to use, and look great!

Extremely well made, and well designed. A pocket size beard brush shouldn’t be impressive, but it really is. If this was plastic, it wouldn’t work. If it was a soft plastic, it wouldn’t help shape a straggly beard, or mustache. If it was hard plastic, it would probably snap. Instead, it is an excellent stainless steel, with enough strength to work perfectly, but is is small enough that you wouldn’t notice any extra weight on your keychain. I have to give the person that designed this a lot of credit. What a practical, and brilliant idea. Completely awesome!
Brilliant!
